segments.text: The scene unfolds in this bright kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window illuminates the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is there, apron on, drying a plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's turned slightly, missing the overflow behind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, water spilling over the basin edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down, wetting cabinets and floor alike.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, stacks of dishes wait patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilts back, a fall seems imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, hand extended for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks so tranquil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence in the background, all orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief and mess could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's neutrality to it all is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR
